stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: Save the dates of September 14-15 for SREday in London! Engage with fellow tech enthusiasts at a two-day gathering, featuring 50+ talks. Don't wait too long, book your early bird tickets now!
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 Save the dates of September 14-15 for SREday in London! Engage with fellow tech enthusiasts at a two-day gathering, featuring 50+ talks. Don't wait too long, book your early bird tickets now! #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: Meet your new coding partner
stories.Description: Meta's upcoming "Code Llama" might redefine coding. This open-source coding companion, built on Llama, is set to offer real-time code suggestions as you type, a potential rival to industry giants.
stories.Tweet: Meet your new coding partner 📦 Meta's upcoming "Code Llama" might redefine coding. This open-source coding companion, built on Llama, is set to offer real-time code suggestions as you type, a potential rival to industry giants. #meta https://gizmodo.com/metas-set-to-drop-a-code-generating-ai-bot-1850751208

stories.Title: Strides in space security
stories.Description: True Anomaly's GravityWorks facility will bring to life small satellites with three cameras, designed for intricate operations and space surveillance. Stay tuned for their launch in 2024.
stories.Tweet: Strides in space security 📦 True Anomaly's GravityWorks facility will bring to life small satellites with three cameras, designed for intricate operations and space surveillance. Stay tuned for their launch in 2024. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/true-anomaly-opens-spacecraft-manufacturing-facility-in-colorado/

stories.Title: Ready for a lunar rendezvous
stories.Description: The Chandrayaan-3 mission is on track for a soft landing on the Moon's south pole on August 23. Successful separation of modules fuels anticipation for India's lunar endeavors.
stories.Tweet: Ready for a lunar rendezvous 📦 The Chandrayaan-3 mission is on track for a soft landing on the Moon's south pole on August 23. Successful separation of modules fuels anticipation for India's lunar endeavors. #india https://interestingengineering.com/science/indias-third-moon-mission-gears-up-for-moon-soft-landing

stories.Title: Insights from the red planet
stories.Description: Mars keeps revealing its mysteries, or at least we're improving at uncovering them. Thanks to NASA's InSight Lander, we now know it's spinning faster each year, shortening its days.
stories.Tweet: Insights from the red planet 📦 Mars keeps revealing its mysteries, or at least we're improving at uncovering them. Thanks to NASA's InSight Lander, we now know it's spinning faster each year, shortening its days. #mars https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/08/mars-keeps-spinning-faster-every-year-nasa-insight-data-says/

stories.Title: Surgery anxiety? AR is here to help
stories.Description: Recent research from the University of Miami suggests that integrating AR into preoperative care could be a viable way of reducing stress and anxiety among surgical patients.
stories.Tweet: Surgery anxiety? AR is here to help 📦 Recent research from the University of Miami suggests that integrating AR into preoperative care could be a viable way of reducing stress and anxiety among surgical patients. #science https://www.techtimes.com/articles/295287/20230818/augmented-reality-alleviate-fear-stress-anxiety-surgical-patients-study-shows.htm

stories.Title: Vision Pro for all
stories.Description: Do you have poor eyesight and want to use Apple's Vision Pro? A recent patent uncovers the concept of customizable lenses that adapt to your prescription, all at the touch of a button.
stories.Tweet: Vision Pro for all 📦 Do you have poor eyesight and want to use Apple's Vision Pro? A recent patent uncovers the concept of customizable lenses that adapt to your prescription, all at the touch of a button. #apple https://www.digitaltrends.com/computing/apple-vision-pro-liquid-lenses/

stories.Title: Mark your calendars!
stories.Description: September is filled with revelations and Microsoft knows it. The tech giant has already sent a save-the-date for a "special event" on the 21st. Details remain unknown, but the excitement is growing.
stories.Tweet: Mark your calendars! 📦 September is filled with revelations and Microsoft knows it. The tech giant has already sent a save-the-date for a "special event" on the 21st. Details remain unknown, but the excitement is growing. #microsoft https://www.engadget.com/microsoft-is-holding-a-special-event-on-september-21st-194223173.html

stories.Title: Faster charging ahead
stories.Description: As the iPhone 15 launch approaches, reports hint at a significant change in its charging capabilities. The shift from Lightning to USB-C might increase charging speeds to 35W.
stories.Tweet: Faster charging ahead 📦 As the iPhone 15 launch approaches, reports hint at a significant change in its charging capabilities. The shift from Lightning to USB-C might increase charging speeds to 35W. #apple https://www.theverge.com/2023/8/18/23836903/apple-iphone-15-usbc-lightning-cable-charging-speed-wattage

stories.Title: Acura introduces the ZDX
stories.Description: During Monterey Car Week, Acura, the luxury subsidiary of Honda, introduced its first all-electric vehicle the ZDX SUV. Customer deliveries are scheduled for 2024.
stories.Tweet: Acura introduces the ZDX 📦 During Monterey Car Week, Acura, the luxury subsidiary of Honda, introduced its first all-electric vehicle the ZDX SUV. Customer deliveries are scheduled for 2024. #EVs https://electrek.co/2023/08/17/acura-finally-joins-the-ev-ethos-unveils-zdx-with-competitive-range-hands-free-driving/

stories.Title: Sharing high-quality memories
stories.Description: Mark Zuckerberg has announced an update that many WhatsApp users have been waiting for, HD photo sharing, along with a forthcoming extension to HD videos.
stories.Tweet: Sharing high-quality memories 📦 Mark Zuckerberg has announced an update that many WhatsApp users have been waiting for, HD photo sharing, along with a forthcoming extension to HD videos. #whatsapp https://techcrunch.com/2023/08/17/whatsapp-adds-support-for-hd-photos-says-hd-video-coming-soon/

title: Meta's coding companion, India gets ready to land, Latest Vision Pro insights
description: Developers… Meta thinks about you. The company’s reported coding companion is set to become a game-changer. The race to the moon continues and India is ready to attempt a soft landing on August 23. And if you’re like me and need lenses to see the world clearly, don’t worry, Apple won’t let that ruin your Vision Pro experience.
